• PRACTICE

Dysgu Cymraeg

Robert Powell - Sylfaen Foundation (A2)

FLASHCARDS

Sentences worth memorising

I don't mind

Does dim ots gyda fi

I prefer coffee

Mae'n well gyda fi goffi

What do you prefer - orange or apple juice?

Beth sy'n well gyda ti - sudd oren neu sudd afal?

What would you like to do?

Beth faset ti'n hoffi ei wneud?

She would live in New Zealand

Basai hi'n byw yn Seland Newydd

They wouldn't sell their Jacuzzi

Fasen nhw ddim yn gwerthu eu jacwsi

I would like to go to Italy

Baswn i'n hoffi mynd i'r Eidal

Could you run a mile?

Fasech chi'n gallu rhedeg milltir?

I wouldn't like to eat snails

Faswn i ddim yn lico bwyta malwod

I bought a newspaper yesterday

Prynais i bapur newydd ddoe

What did you buy yesterday?

Beth prynaist ti ddoe?

Did you buy anything yesterday?

Brynaist ti rywbeth ddoe?

I went to the cinema last month

Es i i'r sinema y mis diwetha

What did you do last night?

Beth wnest ti neithiwr?

When did you arrive today?

Pryd codoch chi heddiw?

Did you have a good time?

Gest ti amser da?

I had a very good time

Ces i amser da iwan

What did you learn?

Beth ddygaist ti?

Did you eat fruit yesterday?

Fwytaist ti ffrwythau ddoe?

Where did you stay on your last holiday?

Ble arhosaist ti ar dy wyliau diwetha?

She started last week

Dechreuoedd hi yr wythnos diwetha

She started walking when she was 9 months old

Dechreuoedd hi cerdded pan oedd hi'n naw mis oedd

She went to the office

Aeth hi i'r swyddfa

I know someone who speaks Italian

Dw i'n nabod rhywun sy'n siarad cymraeg

I don't know anyone who lives in France

Dw i ddim yn nabod neb sy'n byw yn Ffrainc

Do you know anyone who plays netball?

Wyt ti'n nabod rhywun sy'n chwarae pêl-rwyd

I know someone who will be going to Snowden on Sunday

Dwi'n nabod rhywun fydd yn mynd i'r Wyddfa dydd Sul

What's for dinner tonight?

Beth sy i ginio heno?

Who is on the phone?

Pwy sy ar y ffôn?

How many are in the class?

Faint sy yn y dosbarth?

How much time have you got?

Faint o amser sy gyda chi?

How many children have you got?

Faint o blant sy gyda chi?

I know someone who used to play golf

Dwi'n nabod rhywun oedd yn chwarae golff.

What's happening in work this week?

Beth sy'n digwydd yn y gwaith yr wythnos yma?

Jon worked last weekend

Gweithiodd Jon y penwythnos diwetha

Who is going to the meeting?

Pwy sy'n mynd i'r cyfarfod?

What is the price?

Beth yw'r pris?
